channel.title: Research on Rongting Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Rongting Huang

item.title: Robust analysis of allele-specific copy number alterations from scRNA-seq data with XClone
item.description: XClone is an algorithm to infer allele- and haplotype-specific copy numbers in individual cells from low-coverage and sparse single-cell RNA sequencing data (e.g., those generated by 10x Genomics, Smart-seq, etc.)

item.title: MQuad enables clonal substructure discovery using single cell mitochondrial variants
item.description: MQuad: Mixture Model for Mitochondrial Mutation detection in single-cell omics data

item.title: Systematic characterization and prediction of post-translational modification cross-talk between proteins
item.description: A valuable tool to identify inter-protein PTM cross-talk at proteome-wide scale.
